SEARCH
Package RequestSystem

Class RequestController

Object
RequestController
public class RequestController extends Object
The RequestController class manages the workflow of handling replenishment requests for medications. It provides functionalities for loading, saving, viewing, creating, and updating request records.

  • Constructor Details

    • RequestController

      public RequestController()
      Constructs a RequestController and initializes the components for managing requests. Loads initial request records from storage.

  • Method Details

    • loadRequests

      public void loadRequests()
      Loads request records from persistent storage into the system.

    • saveRequests

      public void saveRequests()
      Saves the current state of request to requests.txt

    • viewAllRequests

      public void viewAllRequests()
      Displays all requests in the system. Loads the latest request records before displaying.

    • viewPendingRequests

      public void viewPendingRequests()
      Displays all pending requests in the system. Loads the latest request records before displaying.

    • createNewRequest

      public void createNewRequest()
      Allows a pharmacist to create a new replenishment request. The pharmacist's ID is automatically attached to the request. Saves the updated request records after creation.

    • PharmViewRequests

      public void PharmViewRequests()
      Allows a pharmacist to view their own pending requests. Filters requests by the pharmacist's ID and displays them.

    • updateRequestFlag

      public void updateRequestFlag()
      Prompts an administrator to update the flag (status) of a request. Saves the updated request records after the operation.
